Summary: Feb. 21 2012 is the 7th time I have observed this Brilliant light moving NW thru the sky and slowly descending and disappearing below treeline/mountain slope.
divs: sighting detailsfeb. 21 2012 is the 7th time i have observed this brilliant light moving nw thru the sky at 6:50 pm, i first saw the light slightly north and very low on the horizon a great distance beneath polaris. as the light traveled in a nw direction, at approx. 8:45 it began to slowly descend and at 9:04 it disappeared below the treeline\nw slope of a nearby mountain.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in BEDFORD
There were 4 other sightings in BEDFORD on or around February 21st 2012
